name: THEN AND NOW AND NOW THEN. NOW AND THEN AND THEN NOW.
description: Time and tense are always fun to play with. We have THEN AND NOW (a time before and this very moment) AND NOW THEN (from me just talking about that moment, it already passed). We also have NOW AND THEN (this very moment and previous moments passed) AND THEN NOW (now this very moment). Two completely separate sentences with two different timelines, one ending in the past and one ending in the present. Kind of messes with your mind, but then again do we even understand what time is beyond a duration on a continuum?
